info.fetter.rrdclient
Class DataTable<T>

java.lang.Object
  info.fetter.rrdclient.DataTable<T>
Type Parameters:
T - 
public class DataTable<T>
extends Object

Bidimensional table. Used by the fetch command to return the query results. The rows are indexed by date and the columns by column name.

Author:
Didier Fetter
